entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
